#comment: The following are CMOR internal settings and should not be edited by the user
grid: blended satellite and in-situ date regridded to the continental United States
license: Data in this file is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses).
references: Wang, Z., Kumar, J., Weintraub-Leff, S. R., Todd-Brown, K., Mishra, U., & Sihi, D. (2024). Upscaling soil organic carbon measurements at the continental scale using multivariate clustering analysis and machine learning. Journal of Geophysical Research: Biogeosciences, 129, e2023JG007702. https://doi.org/10.1029/2023JG007702
title: AI-upscaling-cSoil 1 (2024): Upscaling soil organic carbon measurements at the continental scale using multivariate clustering analysis and machine learning
variant_info: obs4MIPs-compliant product prepared by Zhuonan Wang at ORNL using AI-upscaling-cSoil v1 (2024), a machine-learning and clustering-based approach for continental-scale SOC upscaling
